alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:46PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Carson, southeastern Hutchinson, northern Gray and southwestern Roberts Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 646 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kingsmill, or 9 miles southwest of Pampa, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pampa, White Deer, Lefors, Skellytown, Kingsmill, and Codman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas.
